description: Episode of series "Searching for values: a film anthology" Edited from the feature film 'Pursuit of happiness', this extract shows how the legal process and justice are not always synonymous. A college student involved in a car accident rejects the standards by which the court finds him guilty and decides that justice has not been served. Suitable for upper secondary level.
